Posts.Content: Hi I to am in the same position as you, I can't decide what to do regarding the cold cap. The advice on here is pretty good, although mixed, what have you decided to do? does it depend on which type of chemo you have? I have got my appt next week with oncologist to get start date etc......hope you are well, xx
Posts.Title: Cold cap? any advice

Posts.Content: Hi Lynne I agree, if you don't try it then you will always be wondering what if. When do you start your chemo? I presume when I go to see oncologist on Mon that she will tell me the type etc and give me options of cold cap etc, WOW it's all a mine field, the unknown it stresses me out! xx
